pages.text: There are several available $(l)weapons$(), $(l)utilities$() and $(l)armors$().$(br2)They are essential to use in Vaults to deal $(l)increased damage$() and $(l)endure$() longer.$(br2)Vault Gear is found or crafted as $(l:vault_gear/identification)$(l)Unidentified Vault Gear$().

pages.title: Variants
pages.text: $(br)Different variants of Vault Gear have different $(l)amounts$() and $(l)types$() of $(l)Implicits$(), $(l)Prefixes$() and $(l)Suffixes$(). A gear piece can be $(l)modified$() in various Vault Stations.$(br2)Each Vault Gear also has a $(l)random$() number of $(l)repair slots$(). Once a gear piece gets low on $(l)Durability$(), it can be repaired by applying a $(l)Repair Core$() in an $(l)Anvil$().

pages.title: Wardrobe
pages.text: The $(l)Wardobe$() is an easy way to $(l)swap$() between and $(l)compare$() different $(l)gear sets$(). Weapons, utilities, armor and accessories can be saved in it.$(br2)$(l)Multiple$() sets can be saved in multiple Wardrobes.

pages.title: Vault Armor
pages.text: Vault Armor is the only available $(t:Armor is worn in the armor slots)$(l)armor$() type.$(br2)$(l)Armor statistics:$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬜⬜⬜ $(l)Offense$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬛⬛ $(l)Defense$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬜⬜ $(l)Mana$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬜⬜ $(l)Effects$()$(br2)This contains a $(l)Helmet$(), $(l)Chestplate$(), $(l)Leggings$() and $(l)Boots$() variant.

pages.title: Vault Swords
pages.text: A Vault Sword is one of the available $(t:Weapons are worn in the main hand)$(l)weapon$() types.$(br2)$(l)Weapon statistics:$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬜⬜ $(l)Attack Damage$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬛⬜ $(l)Attack Speed$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬜⬜ $(l)Attack Range$()$(br2)It can $(l)only$() be used for $(l)combat$() purposes.

pages.title: Vault Axes
pages.text: A Vault Axe is one of the available $(t:Weapons are worn in the main hand)$(l)weapon$() types.$(br2)$(l)Weapon statistics:$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬜⬜ $(l)Attack Damage$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬜⬜⬜ $(l)Attack Speed$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬛⬜ $(l)Attack Range$()$(br2)It can $(l)only$() be used for $(l)combat$() purposes.

pages.title: Vault Shields
pages.text: A Vault Shield is one of the available $(t:Utilities are worn in the off-hand)$(l)utility$() types.$(br2)$(l)Utility statistics:$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬜⬜⬜ $(l)Offense$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬛⬛ $(l)Defense$()$(br)$(8)⬜⬜⬜⬜⬜ $(l)Mana$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬜⬜ $(l)Effects$()$(br2)Instead of deciding when to block, it grants a $(l)chance$().

pages.title: Vault Idols
pages.text: A Vault Idol is one of the available $(t:Utilities are worn in the off-hand)$(l)utility$() types.$(br2)$(l)Utility statistics:$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬛⬜ $(l)Offense$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬜⬜⬜⬜ $(l)Defense$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬛⬛ $(l)Mana$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬜⬜ $(l)Effects$()$(br2)It holds an affinity, used for completing $(l:the_vault/vault_god_altars)$(l)Vault God Altars$().

pages.title: Magnets
pages.text: A Magnet is the only available $(t:Wearables are worn in the Belt curio slot)$(l)wearable$() type.$(br2)$(l)Wearable statistics:$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬜⬜⬜⬜ $(l)Offense$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬜⬜ $(l)Defense$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬜⬜ $(l)Looting$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬛⬜ $(l)Effects$()$(br2)Magnets can be $(l)toggled$() by the player and disabled by a $(l)Demagnetizer$().

pages.title: Vault Trinkets
pages.text:
A Vault Trinket is the only available $(t:Accessories are worn in the  
Charm or Trinket curio slots)$(l)accessory$() type.$(br2)$(l)Accessory statistics:$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬜⬜⬜⬜ $(l)Offense$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬜⬜ $(l)Defense$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬛⬛ $(l)Versatility$()$(br)$(8)⬛⬛⬛⬛⬜ $(l)Effects$()$(br2)Trinkets grant a $(l)buff$() to the player, at $(l)limited uses$(), decreasing each Vault.
